extendedInfo.description: Take a quiz of the Inland and International Navigation Rules. Learn the meaning of buoyage, dayshapes, lights, and signals in your locale language.The correct answer is randomly placed in one of the button choices, in Quiz mode.Tap on the images, in Study mode, to learn more about the rules. When finished reading, tap on the texts to dismiss it.Score a 100% on the Navigation Rules Quiz to try out the FlyBy game*.Localized to: Afrikaans, Albanian, Arabic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Bulgarian, Chinese (China), Croatian, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Finnish, French, Georgian, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi (India), Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian (Indonesia), Italian, Japanese, Korean, Lao, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay (Malaysia), Maltese, Polish, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovenian, Spanish, Swedish, Tagalog, Tamil (India), Telugu (India), Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu (India), and Vietnamese.You have to change your Android device language setting to play this app in one of the languages listed above. Go to Settings > Language and keyboard > Select language to select an available locale language that is preinstalled in your Android device that can translate this app.* This FlyBy game does not depict how the rules of the road would be applied in a real situation.

reviews.title: Good Application.
reviews.comment: I like this application as a seafarer roaming around the world .. But the blue color background is annoying it is painful to the eyes plus a very small font size .. please change to a better color background and a bigger size font .. thanks.
reviews.author: Jhun Sastre

reviews.title: Gallaxy y Pardeep
reviews.comment: Its really a good impration at first i install and run this app. But later i found that when u run it in quiz mode it doesn\'t show last two option of the que. its really discasting and embarasing. Even after i update this app but still this doesn\'t work properly. Plz fix this problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: This app really helps out thanks for bring this to the Android Market
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor text contrast
reviews.comment: It may be a good app, but the text is too difficult to read on the grey background. Not worth the effort when there are other apps available
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great knowledge
reviews.comment: This app helps for I use it to quiz my guys that work for me at the command I am stationed at for the Navy.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Navigation rules quiz
reviews.comment: Pish! Does not work on HTC wildfire
